RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: safe investment
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Use the targeted silver or gold stack to invest in an opportunity which the Commerce Branch assures is guaranteed to have a positive - if minor - return. You will receive 110-140% of the original amount after 5 days.\n\nNo matter how large the targeted stack is, no more than 1500 units can be invested at once.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: risky investment
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Use the targeted silver or gold stack to make a volatile investment, which may result in a negative or positive return. You will receive 50-250% of the original amount after 5 days.\n\nNo matter how large the targeted stack is, no more than 6000 units can be invested at once.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: wood and dye drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 145 wood and 29 dye per rank held with the Commerce Branch (290 and 58 if the caller is a Trader; 435 and 87 if the caller is a Financier; and so on and so forth).

li.extraString: Call for a drop of 145 wood and 29 dye.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: steel drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 132 steel per rank held with the Commerce Branch (264 if the caller is a Trader; 396 if the caller is a Financier; and so on and so forth).

li.extraString: Call for a drop of 132 steel.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: masonry drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 1 masonry pallet per rank held with the Commerce Branch (2 if the caller is a Trader; 3 if the caller is a Financier; and so on and so forth).\n\nEach pallet contains 250 silver's worth of a type of terrestrial stone blocks of your choice.

li.extraString: Call for a drop of 1 masonry pallet. Each pallet contains 250 silver's worth of a type of stone blocks of your choice.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: fuel drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 110 chemfuel per rank held with the Commerce Branch (220 if the caller is a Trader; 330 if the caller is a Financier; and so on and so forth).

li.extraString: Call for a drop of 110 chemfuel.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: uranium drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 42 uranium per rank held with the Commerce Branch (84 if the caller is a Trader; 126 if the caller is a Financier; and so on and so forth).

li.extraString: Call for a drop of 42 uranium.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: cloth and dye drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 145 cloth and 14 dye per rank held with the Commerce Branch (290 and 28 if the caller is a Trader; 435 and 42 if the caller is a Financier; and so on and so forth).

li.extraString: Call for a drop of 145 cloth and 14 dye.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: plasteel drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 28 plasteel per rank held with the Commerce Branch (56 if the caller is a Trader; 84 if the caller is a Financier; and so on and so forth).

li.extraString: Call for a drop of 28 plasteel.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: jade drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 50 jade per rank held with the Commerce Branch (100 if the caller is a Trader; 150 if the caller is a Financier; and so on and so forth).

li.extraString: Call for a drop of 50 jade.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: component drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 10 components per rank held with the Commerce Branch (20 if the caller is a Trader; 30 if the caller is a Financier; and so on and so forth).

li.extraString: Call for a drop of 10 components.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: obsidian drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 50 obsidian per rank held with the Commerce Branch (100 if the caller is a Trader; 150 if the caller is a Financier; and so on and so forth).

li.extraString: Call for a drop of 50 obsidian.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: titanium drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 8 titanium per rank held with the Commerce Branch (16 if the caller is a Trader; 24 if the caller is a Financier; and so on and so forth).

li.extraString: Call for a drop of 8 titanium.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: silicon drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 250 silicon per rank held with the Commerce Branch (500 if the caller is a Trader; 750 if the caller is a Financier; and so on and so forth).

li.extraString: Call for a drop of 250 silicon.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: alpha poly drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 2 alpha poly per rank held with the Commerce Branch (4 if the caller is a Trader; 6 if the caller is a Financier; and so on and so forth).

li.extraString: Call for a drop of 2 alpha poly.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: beta poly drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 1 beta poly per rank held with the Commerce Branch (2 if the caller is a Trader; 3 if the caller is a Financier; and so on and so forth).

li.extraString: Call for a drop of 1 beta poly.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: gemstone drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 1 gemstone pallet per rank held with the Commerce Branch (2 if the caller is a Trader; 3 if the caller is a Financier; and so on and so forth).\n\nEach pallet contains 250 silver's worth of a type of gemstone of your choice.

li.extraString: Call for a drop of 1 gemstone pallet. Each pallet contains 250 silver's worth of a type of gemstone of your choice.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: artisanal drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 1 artisan pallet per rank held with the Commerce Branch (2 if the caller is a Trader; 3 if the caller is a Financier; and so on and so forth).\n\nEach pallet contains 250 silver's worth of a type of artisanal craft of your choice.

li.extraString: Call for a drop of 1 artisan pallet. Each pallet contains 250 silver's worth of a type of artisanal craft of your choice.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: condiment drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 1 condiment pallet per rank held with the Commerce Branch (2 if the caller is a Trader; 3 if the caller is a Financier; and so on and so forth).\n\nEach pallet contains 250 silver's worth of a type of condiment of your choice.

li.extraString: Call for a drop of 1 condiment pallet. Each pallet contains 250 silver's worth of a type of condiment of your choice.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: desertion bribe
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Tempt the target enemy with a Commerce Branch-backed lucrative offer in exchange for their immediate hasty retreat.\n\nOnly works on enemies. Bribes cannot be accepted by anyone who is experiencing a mental break or who lacks human-level intelligence.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: recruitment bribe
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Tempt the target prisoner with a Commerce Branch-backed lucrative offer in exchange for their cooperation. This reduces resistance by 15, but can't recruit the target.\n\nBribes cannot be accepted by prisoners experiencing a mental break.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: signal cargo pods
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Arrange for someone to look the other way while resource-containing drop pods conveniently misfire and land near your location. An additional set of cargo pods is sent per additional rank held with the Commerce Branch (2 if the caller is a Financier; 3 if the caller is a Marketeer; and so on and so forth).

li.extraString: Arrange for someone to look the other way while resource-containing drop pods conveniently misfire and land near your location.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: signal minor raid
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Get the Commerce Branch to lure a small group of raiders (10% to 40% as strong as normal) by spreading news of your wealth and vulnerability to bandits. The raiders will arrive within 1-2 days.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: flash investment
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Use the targeted silver or gold stack to make an extremely volatile, time-sensitive investment, which may result in a negative or positive return. You will receive 1-300% of the original amount within a few seconds.\n\nNo matter how large the targeted stack is, no more than 6000 units can be invested at once.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: ingratiation bribe
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Make a lucrative Commerce Branch-backed offer to the target's faction on your behalf, gaining goodwill with that faction.\n\nThis bribe cannot be accepted by Branch members, those from factions that cannot be negotiated with, or those experiencing mental breaks.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: signal major raid
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Get the Commerce Branch to lure a large group of raiders (as large as a typical raid) by spreading news of your wealth and vulnerability to bandits. They will arrive within 1-2 days.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: signal trader caravan
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Signal a trader caravan to arrive within 3-5 days.\n\nCosts two permit points.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: signal orbital trader
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Establish contact with an orbital trader. No more than five orbital traders can be in contact at one time.\n\nCosts two permit points.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: signal extreme raid
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Get the Commerce Branch to lure a very large group of raiders (between 125% to 240% as large as normal) by spreading news of your wealth and vulnerability to bandits. They will arrive within 1-2 days.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: peacemaking bribe
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description:
Tempt all enemies in the same zone with lucrative Commerce Branch-backed offers in exchange for their immediate hasty retreat.

Only works on unimprisoned enemies with human-level intelligence not in a mental break.

Costs two permit points.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: ARC component drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 2 ARC components.\n\nCosts two permit points.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: mini turret drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a friendly mini-slugger turret, which lasts for 4 days.\nSince it is programmed by the Pax Branch, it will target their enemies and ignore anyone they deem friendly.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: firefoam shell drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 3 firefoam shells per rank held with the Pax Branch (6 if the caller is an Adarga; 9 if the caller is an Aspis; and so on and so forth).

li.extraString: Call for a drop of 3 firefoam shells.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: smoke shell drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 3 smoke shells per rank held with the Pax Branch (6 if the caller is an Adarga; 9 if the caller is an Aspis; and so on and so forth).

li.extraString: Call for a drop of 3 smoke shells.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: tar shell drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 3 tar shells per rank held with the Pax Branch (6 if the caller is an Adarga; 9 if the caller is an Aspis; and so on and so forth).

li.extraString: Call for a drop of 3 tar shells.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: combat assist
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Link the target to an automated combat assistance program for 8 hours, improving attack accuracy and range.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: orbital scalpel
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a high-velocity antipersonnel round to be fired from orbit at the target building or creature, dealing 100 concussive damage instantly.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: charge turret drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a friendly auto charge turret, which lasts for 2 days.\nSince it is programmed by the Pax Branch, it will target their enemies and ignore anyone they deem friendly.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: inferno turret drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a friendly auto inferno turret, which lasts for 2 days.\nSince it is programmed by the Pax Branch, it will target their enemies and ignore anyone they deem friendly.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: mortar turret drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a friendly auto mortar turret, which lasts for 2 days.\nSince it is programmed by the Pax Branch, it will target their enemies and ignore anyone they deem friendly.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: portable turret drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 1 steel mini-turret. It requires power, but it doesn't have a timed life and it can be repositioned.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: go-juice drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 8 go-juice canisters, plus 4 per rank held with the Pax Branch past Adarga (12 if the caller is an Aspis; 9 if the caller is an Ishilangu; and so on and so forth).

li.extraString: Call for a drop of 8 go-juice canisters.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: chain turret drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a friendly auto chain turret, which lasts for 2 days.\nSince it is programmed by the Pax Branch, it will target their enemies and ignore anyone they deem friendly.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: barrel drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 1 reinforced barrel.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: EMP shell drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 4 EMP shells per rank held with the Pax Branch past Ishilangu (5 if the caller is a Pavise; 6 if the caller is a Citadel).

li.extraString: Call for a drop of 4 EMP shells.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: HE shell drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 4 high-explosive shells per rank held with the Pax Branch past Ishilangu (5 if the caller is a Pavise; 6 if the caller is a Citadel).

li.extraString: Call for a drop of 4 high-explosive shells.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: tox shell drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 4 tox shells per rank held with the Pax Branch past Ishilangu (5 if the caller is a Pavise; 6 if the caller is a Citadel).

li.extraString: Call for a drop of 4 tox shells.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: deadlife shell drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 4 deadlife shells per rank held with the Pax Branch past Ishilangu (5 if the caller is a Pavise; 6 if the caller is a Citadel).

li.extraString: Call for a drop of 4 deadlife shells.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: cluster shell drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 2 cluster shells, or 3 if the caller has achieved the rank of Citadel.

li.extraString: Call for a drop of 2 cluster shells.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: piercing shell drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 4 armor-piercing shells, plus 1 per rank held with the Pax Branch past Ishilangu (5 if the caller is a Pavise; 6 if the caller is a Citadel).

li.extraString: Call for a drop of 4 armor-piercing shells.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: shrapnel shell drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 4 shrapnel shells, plus 1 per rank held with the Pax Branch past Ishilangu (5 if the caller is a Pavise; 6 if the caller is a Citadel).

li.extraString: Call for a drop of 4 shrapnel shells.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: low-shield drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a friendly low-shield, which lasts for 2 hours.\n\nCosts two permit points.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: high-shield drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a friendly high-shield, which lasts for 1 day.\n\nCosts two permit points.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: bait infestation
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Send antagonizing signals deep into the earth, provoking an infestation of moderate size.\nThe insects will refuse to surface if the target location is too cold (lower than -17 degrees Celsius).

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: animal disruption
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Activate a remote animal pulser weapon, driving all animals in the region into a manhunting rage. Animals currently under your control will not be affected.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: EMI disruption
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Activate a targeted EMI dynamo, shutting down all electronic devices in the region for 1 day, and stunning hostile buildings for the first hour.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: sunlight disruption
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Activate a targeted sun blocker, obstructing daylight for 3 days.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: toxic disruption
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Activate a targeted toxic spewer, inducing a toxic fallout for 3 days.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: call orbital strike
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for an explosive shot to be fired at a target position.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: field of turrets
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for 10 friendly mini-slugger turrets, which each last for 4 days.\nSince they are programmed by the Pax Branch, they will target the Enterprise's enemies and ignore anyone they deem friendly.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: rain of wasps
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for 100 wasp drones to aid you in battle.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: Antigrain shell drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 1 antigrain shell.\n\nCosts two permit points.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: bait mech cluster
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Send antagonizing signals to the mechanoid hive network, causing it to drop a potentially hostile mech cluster at the target point.\n\nMech clusters cannot be called in the absence of a functioning global mechhive.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: call orbital volley
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for 5 explosive shots to be fired around a target position.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: call orbital beam
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a thermal beam to be fired on a target position.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: travelogue drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a random travelogue per rank held with the Rover Branch (2 if the caller is an Itinerant; 3 if the caller is a Wayfarer; and so on and so forth).\n\nTravelogues have some value as recreational reading.

li.extraString: Call for a random travelogue.\n\nTravelogues make for recreational reading.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: cooling gear drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 1 good-quality camelhide bedroll, 1 good-quality bearskin duster, and 1 good-quality bearskin pants.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: warming gear drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 1 good-quality heavy fur bedroll, 1 good-quality muffalo wool parka, and 1 good-quality muffalo wool pants.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: ration drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 12 packaged survival meals per rank held with the Rover Branch (24 if the caller is an Itinerant; 36 if the caller is a Wayfarer; and so on and so forth).

li.extraString: Call for a drop of 12 packaged survival meals.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: beer drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 20 beer bottles per rank held with the Rover Branch (24 if the caller is an Itinerant; 36 if the caller is a Wayfarer; and so on and so forth).

li.extraString: Call for a drop of 20 beer bottles.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: aid caravan foraging
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Mark the target individual. For the next 5 days, any caravan the target is part of will be advised of best foraging spots and practices, enhancing the amount of food foraged.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: aid caravan heisting
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Mark the target individual. For the next 5 days, the target is part of will be advised on the security measures of any settlement encountered while caravanning, enabling and enhancing burglary attempts.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: comfort caravan
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Mark the target individual. For the next 5 days, any caravan the target is part of will have access to exclusive, high-quality radio broadcasts that enhance mood, reduce boredom, and better sleep effectiveness.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: conceal caravan
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Mark the target individual. For the next 5 days, any caravan the target is part of will benefit from satellite guidance, optimizing its route to evade detection by hostile parties.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: hasten caravan
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Mark the target individual. For the next 5 days, any caravan the target is part of will benefit from satellite guidance, optimizing its route to attain maximal speed.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: power drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 100 chemfuel and 1 fully charged battery. Another 50 chemfuel is dropped per rank held with the Rover Branch past Itinerant (150 if the caller is a Wayfarer; 200 and 4 if the caller is a Voyager; and so on and so forth).

li.extraString: Call for a drop of 100 chemfuel and 1 fully charged battery.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: telescope drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 1 telescope.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: horse drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for the delivery of 1 tame horse from the Rover Branch.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: map drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for two maps from the Rover Branch, which can be read to discover sites of interest.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: gravlite panel drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 150 gravlite panels, plus another 50 per rank held with the Rover Branch past Wayfarer (200 if the caller is a Voyager; 250 if the caller is a Globetrotter; 300 if the caller is a Boundless).

li.extraString: Call for a drop of 150 gravlite panels.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: find item stash
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Learn about the location of a nearby item stash.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: find rescuee
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Learn about the location of a nearby prisoner or wounded traveler who would be willing to join up with whoever rescues them. Unlike random such rescuees, the Rover Branch is able to provide detailed information on these persons.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: find resource node
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Learn about the location of a nearby outcropping that can be mined for precious resources.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: call transit shuttle A
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call a shuttle for your own use. It will transport colonists, items, and animals anywhere you like within 70 world tiles.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: direhorse drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for the delivery of 1 tame direhorse from the Rover Branch.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: jump pack drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 1 jump pack.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: locust armor drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 1 locust armor suit.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: vacsuit drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 1 full vacsuit, including helmet.\n\nCosts two permit points.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: car part drop
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call for a drop of 3 random car parts, plus another 1 per rank held with the Rover Branch past Voyager (4 if the caller is a Globetrotter; 5 if the caller is a Boundless).

li.extraString: Call for a drop of 3 random car parts.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: call transit shuttle B
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call a shuttle for your own use. It will transport colonists, items, and animals anywhere you like within 70 world tiles.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: find ancient complex
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Learn about the location of a nearby ancient complex.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: find work sites
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Learn about the locations of two nearby work sites.\n\nDue to technical issues, this permit does not work correctly if you use it while you have a colony on a tiny landlocked island.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: find fleshmass outbreak
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Learn about the location of a nearby fleshmass outbreak.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: find brigand lair
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Learn about the location of a nearby bandit camp. There is a small chance for the bandits to be an ancient mercenary company in possession of a unique weapon.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: find abandoned biotech lab
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Learn about the location of a nearby abandoned biotech lab.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: find noteworthy sites
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Learn about three random, interesting nearby locations.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: find mechanitor tomb
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Learn about the location of a nearby mechanitor tomb.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: find research request
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Learn about the location of a nearby research team in need of assistance.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: call transit shuttle C
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call a shuttle for your own use. It will transport colonists, items, and animals anywhere you like within 70 world tiles.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: find gravcore
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Learn about the location of a gravcore.\n\nCosts two permit points.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: find lost city
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Learn about the location of a nearby lost city.\n\nCosts two permit points.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: find starship
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Learn about the location of a nearby starting-up starship.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: find glittertech site
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Learn about a location where glitterworld technology is being held.\n\nCosts two permit points.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: find abandoned base
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Learn about the location of a nearby abandoned base which formerly belonged to another colony.\n\nCosts two permit points.

RoyalTitlePermitDef.label: call transit shuttle D
RoyalTitlePermitDef.description: Call a shuttle for your own use. It will transport colonists, items, and animals anywhere you like within 70 world tiles.
